SEARCH

Uses of Annotation Interface
org.annotation.DataBase

Packages that use DataBase
Package
Description
org.db.connecting
Package that have files responsible for Establishing connection with DB (Connection.java) Getting all data from DB (Data.java) Getting details for logging in (LoggingIn.java)
org.db.manage
Package that have files responsible for Adding or deleting questions (Adding.java & Deleting.java) Sorting DB (Sorting.java) Preparing String to further usage (StringOperations.java) Changing password/login (ChangePassword.java) Storing current table (SQL.java) Getting answers and questions in String array (ToStrings.java) Getting info about records in current table (SQL.java)
org.db.tables
Package that have files responsible for managing tables Adding tables (Add.java) Deleting tables (Delete.java)
